BaseTemplate.description: Neurora - AI-powered creation platform for creators

Index.meta_title: Neurora - AI Creation Platform for Content Creators
Index.meta_description: Neurora is built for creators. An AI-powered intelligent creation platform designed specifically for knowledge bloggers and content creators.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.meta_description: Learn about Neurora team and our mission
About.about_paragraph: Welcome to Neurora! We are a passionate team dedicated to building the most advanced AI-powered creation platform for creators.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Want to build your SaaS faster using the same stack? Try <url></url>.

Footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest product updates and insights.

HomePage.hero_description: An AI-powered intelligent creation platform designed specifically for knowledge bloggers and content creators to maximize the value of thinkers.
HomePage.features_description: Integrated with advanced AI technology, providing a complete creation toolkit to help content creators maximize their value.
HomePage.cta_description: Join thousands of creators using Neurora to craft professional content and unlock your creative potential.

nextjs.title: AI-Powered Creation Engine
nextjs.description: Advanced artificial intelligence that understands your content needs, generating high-quality drafts, suggestions, and optimizations tailored to your unique voice and style.

design.title: Professional Content Studio
design.description: Complete content creation toolkit with modern editing interface, collaborative features, and professional templates designed for knowledge creators.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Built-in security with encrypted data storage, secure collaboration, and privacy-first approach to protect your intellectual property and content.

performance.title: Lightning-Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized for speed and efficiency with real-time collaboration, instant previews, and seamless publishing across multiple platforms.

i18n.title: Global Publishing Ready
i18n.description: Multi-language support with automated translation capabilities and localization tools to reach global audiences effortlessly.

testing.title: Quality Assurance
testing.description: Built-in content validation, plagiarism detection, SEO optimization, and analytics to ensure your content meets the highest standards.

HomePage.use_cases_description: Whether you're an individual blogger or an enterprise content team, Neurora scales with your creative ambitions.

individual.label: Individual
individual.title: Personal Knowledge Sharing
individual.description: Designed for individual knowledge bloggers with content creation tools, SEO optimization, and audience engagement features to build your personal brand.

team.label: Team
team.title: Collaborative Content Creation
team.description: Multi-user collaboration with version control and content review workflows, perfect for content teams working together efficiently.

enterprise.label: Enterprise
enterprise.title: Enterprise Content Marketing
enterprise.description: Enterprise-grade security and management features with brand consistency controls, multi-channel publishing, and advanced analytics.

education.label: Education
education.title: Educational Content
education.description: Specially designed for educators with course content creation, learning path design, and student interaction capabilities.

DemoBanner.demo_text: Next.js Template Demo - Developed by Neurora Team
